channel.title: Nature-gallery on An Inordinate Fondness for Data
channel.description: Recent content in Nature-gallery on An Inordinate Fondness for Data

item.title: Bees
item.description: Bees Agapostemon sp., San Francisco, USA. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Anthidium manicatum, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Osmia leaiana, Welsh Wildlife Centre, Wales. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss

item.title: Hoverflies
item.description: Hoverflies Eupeodes corollae feeding on a mullein flower, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Meliscaeva auricollis feeding on mullein, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Scaeva pyrastri feeding on mullein, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Sphaerophoria sp., Chilterns AONB, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Toxomerus occidentalis on a thistle flower, Golden Gate NRA, USA. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Volucella inanis on ragwort, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss

item.title: Other flies
item.description: Non-syrphid flies Ctenophora pectiniformis (Tipulidae), near Abermawr, Wales. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Dexiosoma caninum (Tachinidae), Sheffield Park NT, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Haematopota crassicornis (Tabanidae), British Wildlife Centre, England. © 2016 Dylan Hodgkiss Nowickia ferox (Tachinidae) on ragwort, Chilterns AONB, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Stomoxys calcitrans (Muscidae), Sheffield Park NT, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss

item.title: Wasps
item.description: Wasps Cerceris rybyensis on oxeye daisy, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss
